title: Lag Spikes
body: I've been getting Lag Spikes while playing League Of Legends! My ping shoots up to 300 in every engagement or every 5 seconds, and I can't even play properly anymore. I've tried everything yet nothing seems to fix it! I know my Internet itself is excellent. Someone, Please Help!

replies.body: It sounds like your network has a week connection or suffering packet loss trying to reach the game server, which is causing these delays when big fights happen.  I suggest running a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to help figure out what's going wrong.  The results will provide details on your specific situation, as well as offer a series of instructions to get it fixed up.  I hope that helps, but let me know if you continue to have issues.

The Hextech Repair Tool didn't do anything. I am still experiencing Lag Spikes every 5 seconds, and I don't know how to fix the packet loss. My Network is fine as I can play fps games without any trouble on my ps4.

Thanks for following up on this.  No worries, our tech team can help out and find some options for you!  [Submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we'll look into your specific issue.  The Hextech Repair Tool can also automatically gather a set of logs which you can attach to your ticket for context.  We'll continue working with you there!
I just checked the log reader and it says that my average packet loss was 13.57%. I'm running that Hextech Repair tool right now and hope it fixes something.

Riney,what desktop/laptop do you use? I have a new laptop since tuesday.. It's a Hp15 notebook Pc. Idk if its the laptop fault but My League of Legends client works well but when I'm in game I lag badly :/ . I tried changing my game preferences like Graphics to low quality,etc but still this lag keeps going. Idk if  there's issues with this 6.15 patch but I'll see what happens when I repair it.

There are issues with 6.15 but it's not affecting everybody, which is why we're handling them on a case by case basis.

What type of lag do you experience?

1. High Ping / Ping Spikes?
2. Low FPS?
3. Unresponsive champions / minions (your ping and FPS is fine but you're still lagging)?
My FPS Max is like 45 then it drops to 01 & goes slowly back but takes time XC.. & I'm banned for 20mins because of that I keep leaving games
